p.d: The PEAR::Net_Ident implements Identification Protocol according to RFC 1413. The Identification Protocol (a.k.a., &quot;ident&quot;, a.k.a., &quot;the Ident Protocol&quot;) provides a means to determine the identity of a user of a particular TCP connection. Given a TCP port number pair, it returns a character string which identifies the owner of that connection on the server's system.
